attributes.action: Create protection so that terrorism laws can not be misused by the government and police.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Additional laws need to be put in place to stop laws designed to prevent terrorism being used against the general public. This includes the stop and search of photographers, People being held without charge for non terrorist offences, Local government using terrorist laws to spy or moniter the public for cival offenses and stopping of protests without a permit. Terrorist laws are there to stop terrorists and therefore should only be used against terrorists.
